name: Mandragorae Somnus
description:
As a dormant mandrake, you must reach the safest water resource of the underground, in order to do such a thing, you need to extend your roots to get there, but only 2 roots aren't enough to prevail in its depths!

How To Play:

-Left-Click on the root to select it and then right-click on the ground to move to that position.
-To collect a resource, just put the root over it and wait.
-Move the camera by pressing “W” and “S” or “Up arrow” and “Down arrow” to move up and down respectively.

This game was a submission to the 48th ludum dare
Theme: Deeper and Deeper
